greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Mod( binomial(2*n,n), (n+1)*(n+2) ).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
C. Pomerance, Divisors of the middle binomial coefficient, Amer. Math. Monthly, 112 (2015), 636-644.
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b065344.txt", n, " ", binomial(2*n, n) % ((n + 1)*(n + 2))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 17 2009
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 30 2001
